overview:
## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingController] uses the UTI to determine if the shared item is a special type. This allows text presented by the controller to refer to the item using descriptive wording. For example, if the shared item is a presentation and `kUTTypePresentation` is returned, the screens refer to the shared item as a *presentation*. Likewise, if the shared item is a document and `kUTTypeContent` is returned, the screens refer to the item as a *document*. And when `kUTTypeSpreadsheet` is returned, the screens refer to the item as a *spreadsheet*.

For types unique to your app, return `nil` or do not implement this method.

# itemType(for:)

**Instance Method**

Asks the delegate for the Uniform Type Identifier (UTI) of the item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func itemType(for csc: UICloudSharingController) -> String?
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingController] uses the UTI to determine if the shared item is a special type. This allows text presented by the controller to refer to the item using descriptive wording. For example, if the shared item is a presentation and `kUTTypePresentation` is returned, the screens refer to the shared item as a *presentation*. Likewise, if the shared item is a document and `kUTTypeContent` is returned, the screens refer to the item as a *document*. And when `kUTTypeSpreadsheet` is returned, the screens refer to the item as a *spreadsheet*.

For types unique to your app, return `nil` or do not implement this method.



## Configuring the view controller

- **itemTitle(for:)**: Asks the delegate for the title to display on the invitation screen.
- **itemThumbnailData(for:)**: Asks the delegate for the thumbnail image data to display on the invitation.

items.description: Asks the delegate for the title to display on the invitation screen.
items.name: itemTitle(for:)

items.description: Asks the delegate for the thumbnail image data to display on the invitation.
items.name: itemThumbnailData(for:)

title: itemType(for:)
